## Integrative Genomics

- Paper: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3017387/pdf/evq077.pdf

## Electronic Medical/Health Records

### [Analysis of insurance claims]()

- Wang, K., Gaitsch, H., Poon, H., Cox, N. J., & Rzhetsky, A. (2017). Classification of common human diseases derived from shared genetic and environmental determinants. *Nat. Genet.*
- Paper: http://www.nature.com/ng/journal/v49/n9/full/ng.3931.html

### [TreeWAS model]()

- Cortes, A., Dendrou, C., Motyer, A., Jostins, L., Vukcevic, D., Dilthey, A., Donnelly, P., Leslie, S., Fugger, L., & McVean, G. (2017). Bayesian analysis of genetic association across tree-structured routine healthcare data in the UK Biobank. *Nat. Genet.*

- Software: https://github.com/mcveanlab/TreeWAS
